serviceData.title: Comprehensive Roofing Solutions in Columbus, OH
serviceData.p: Homeland Roofing LLC specializes in residential and commercial roofing: new roof installations, full roof replacements, leak repairs, storm damage restoration, preventative maintenance, and insurance claims assistance. We use high-quality materials and proven installation techniques to maximize roof life and curb appeal.

lists.title: Asphalt Shingle Roofing
lists.shortDescription: Popular, cost-effective roofing for Columbus homes — available in dimensional and architectural shingles with long-lasting warranties.
lists.description:
• Scope: Roof replacement and new installations for single-family homes

  • Benefits:

    • Wide selection of colors and shingle profiles to match your home

    • Quick installation and reliable weather performance for Ohio climates

    • Options for enhanced algae resistance and extended warranties
lists.p2: Asphalt shingles are the most common roofing material for Columbus residences. They offer an excellent balance of durability, cost, and aesthetic choices. Homeland Roofing LLC installs high-grade architectural and laminated shingles, ensuring proper underlayment, ventilation, and flashing to protect your home from wind, rain, and hail. Contact us at [phone] for a free roof inspection and estimate.
lists.tyesHeading: When Do You Need a New Asphalt Shingle Roof?
lists.overViewContent:
What's Included:

  • Full roof tear-off (if requested) or overlay options

  • Starter, ridge, and hip shingles; ice & water shield in vulnerable areas

  • New flashing, vents, and roof-edge drip/integration

  • Jobsite cleanup and shingle disposal

Typical Project Size & Timeline:
Single-family homes — 1 to 3 days depending on size and decking condition
Common Warranties: 25 to 50 years (manufacturer dependent)

leftSection.title: Free Roof Inspection
leftSection.description: We inspect shingles, flashing, gutters, and attic ventilation to identify leaks, rot, and storm damage. Written estimates and photographic documentation included.

rightSection.title: How to Choose the Right Shingle
rightSection.description: Consider lifespan, wind rating, algae resistance, and warranty. We help homeowners pick shingles that match style and long-term performance needs.

lists.comapreHeading: What to Expect with Asphalt Shingle Roofing
allowedItems: Full roof inspection and digital report
Removal and disposal of old shingles (if selected)
New underlayment, flashing, and ridge caps
prohibitedItems: Structural deck replacement beyond standard repair (quoted separately)
Interior water damage restoration (customer's responsibility or insurance)
Specialty historic or slate roofing (requires custom quote)
Tree trimming (unless arranged prior to work)

lists.title: Metal Roofing
lists.shortDescription: Durable, energy-efficient metal roofing systems for homeowners and light commercial buildings — standing seam, metal shingles, and steel panels.

lists.h2: Metal Roofing Options for Homes and Light Commercial Buildings
lists.p2: Metal roofing is an excellent long-term investment for Columbus properties that demand durability and energy performance. Homeland Roofing installs standing seam, corrugated, and interlocking metal shingles, including options with factory-applied paint and snow-shedding profiles. We also handle retrofit installations and full tear-offs. Call [phone] to discuss metal roofing benefits and get a project estimate.
lists.tyesHeading: Why Choose Metal Roofing in Columbus, OH?
lists.p3: Longevity | Hail and wind resistance | Energy savings through reflective finishes | Low maintenance | Attractive modern appearance
lists.seoContent:

leftSection.title: Metal Roofing Benefits
leftSection.description: Superior lifetime value, energy savings, and strong warranties. Great for steep-slope roofs and modern architectural styles.

rightSection.title: How to Select Metal Panels
rightSection.description: Choose panel profile, gauge, finish, and warranty to match aesthetics and performance needs. We provide samples and performance comparisons.

lists.comapreHeading: What to Expect with Metal Roofing
allowedItems: Homeowners seeking long-term roof life (40+ years)
Properties prone to wind or hail exposure
Architectural projects requiring a modern metal look
prohibitedItems: Low-slope roofs unless using specific standing seam systems

  • Benefits:

    • Energy-efficient white-TPO options reduce cooling costs

lists.h2: Reliable Flat Roof Systems for Columbus Commercial Properties
lists.p2: Homeland Roofing LLC installs and maintains TPO, EPDM, and modified bitumen systems for commercial and multifamily buildings in Columbus, OH. Our technicians focus on proper insulation, drainage, and flashing details to reduce leaks and extend roof life. We offer planned maintenance contracts and emergency leak response. Call [phone] to schedule a commercial roofing evaluation.
lists.tyesHeading: When to Repair vs. Replace a Flat Roof
lists.p3: Minor membrane patches and flashing repairs can extend life; widespread ponding, recurrent leaks, or saturated insulation typically indicate replacement. We provide clear condition assessments and cost-effective recommendations.
